TopicTitle: radialy attached struts not saved in craft file corectly

Articles.Content:
when i radialy attach struts to my vessel, then save and reload the craft file in VAB, the struts show on the craft, but when i launch the craft the struts aren't there and my craft falls apart. to get arround this, whenever i load a craft with radial struts, i have to manually replace them or they wont be there when I launch.

version: 0.1.2.0

OS: windows 10

specs: gtx 1650, Processor    Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700K CPU @ 3.80GHz, 3792 Mhz, 8 Core(s), 16 Logical Processor(s)

edit: as shown in this screenshot, the radially attached struts on the radially attached rockets work, but for the stunts that are radially attached to the main rocket, the strut beam isn't there. (the bases still exist)
